message.name: ERR_WORK_ALLOCATION_FUNCTION_FV_NAME_INCORRECT_FORMAT
message.locale: The function name must not contain spaces.

message.name: ERR_WORK_ALLOCATION_FUNCTION_FV_NAME_OVERLAP_EXISTS
message.locale: An allocation function already exists with this name.

message.name: ERR_WORK_ALLOCATION_FUNCTION_XRV_TASK_DEF_LINK
message.locale: The function cannot be removed as it is currently used by a task definition.

message.name: ERR_WORK_ALLOCATION_FUNCTION_XRV_NOT_EXIST
message.locale: The function you have specified does not exist.
